summary: Seven warriors come together to protect a village from a diabolical General.
cast: Leon Lai|Donnie Yen|Charlie Yeung|Honglei Sun|Yi Lu|So-yeon Kim|Chia-Liang Liu|Jingchu Zhang|Li-Wu Tai|Duncan Lai|Jason Piao Pai|Kuan-Chun Chi|Peng Huang|Haitao Li|Jingwu Ma|Michael Wong|Ming Zhe Liu|Chi Man Wong|Tengfei Tang|Gu Kun|Hai-Bin Lin|Feng-Qiang Guo|Zhang Jie|Zhen-Bao Liu|Xie Zhang|Jiajia Chen|Guang-Jin Jiang|Bing Bo|Shang-Lei Yang|Chang-Cheng Deng|Bai-Ling Yao|Gui-Jun Zhang|Chang-Hung Li|Xi-Bin Jie|Zan-Hua Yao|Zeng-Bin Bai|Chao Zhang|Ruan Tang|Ji-Dong Du|Meng-Zhu Sui|Du-Shuai Chen|Lan-Ji Chen|Lanji Chen|Fei Gao|Zhi-Yang Gao|Ming Hu|Ke-Yu Jiang|Qing-Zeng Ma|Li-Ming Tuo|Wen-Su Wang|Wenjie Wang|Lixiao Yang|Michelle Yim|Yang Zhang|Hao Zhou
title: Siete espadas
